00029 // DLLs in Windows should use the standard calling convention
00030 #ifndef ADR_CALL
00031   #if defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32)
00032     #define ADR_CALL __stdcall
00033   #else
00034     #define ADR_CALL
00035   #endif
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 // Export functions from the DLL
00039 #ifndef ADR_DECL
00040 #  if defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32)
00041 #    ifdef AUDIERE_EXPORTS
00042 #      define ADR_DECL __declspec(dllexport)
00043 #    else
00044 #      define ADR_DECL __declspec(dllimport)
00045 #    endif
00046 #  else
00047 #    define ADR_DECL
00048 #  endif
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053 #define ADR_FUNCTION(ret, name) extern "C" ADR_DECL ret ADR_CALL name

00058   class RefCounted {
00059   protected:
00067     ~RefCounted() { }
00068 
00069   public:
00073     virtual void ADR_CALL ref() = 0;
00074 
00079     virtual void ADR_CALL unref() = 0;
00080   };
00081 
00082 
00083   template<typename T>
00084   class RefPtr {
00085   public:
00086     RefPtr(T* ptr = 0) {
00087       m_ptr = 0;
00088       *this = ptr;
00089     }
00090 
00091     RefPtr(const RefPtr<T>& ptr) {
00092       m_ptr = 0;
00093       *this = ptr;
00094     }
00095 
00096     ~RefPtr() {
00097       if (m_ptr) {
00098         m_ptr->unref();
00099         m_ptr = 0;
00100       }
00101     }
00102  
00103     RefPtr<T>& operator=(T* ptr) {
00104       if (ptr != m_ptr) {
00105         if (m_ptr) {
00106           m_ptr->unref();
00107         }
00108         m_ptr = ptr;
00109         if (m_ptr) {
00110           m_ptr->ref();
00111         }
00112       }
00113       return *this;
00114     }
00115 
00116     RefPtr<T>& operator=(const RefPtr<T>& ptr) {
00117       *this = ptr.m_ptr;
00118       return *this;
00119     }
00120 
00121     T* operator->() const {
00122       return m_ptr;
00123     }
00124 
00125     T& operator*() const {
00126       return *m_ptr;
00127     }
00128 
00129     operator bool() const {
00130       return (m_ptr != 0);
00131     }
00132 
00133     T* get() const {
00134       return m_ptr;
00135     }
00136 
00137   private:
00138     T* m_ptr;
00139   };
00140

00146   template<class Interface>
00147   class RefImplementation : public Interface {
00148   protected:
00149     RefImplementation() {
00150       m_ref_count = 0;
00151     }
00152 
00157     virtual ~RefImplementation() { }
00158 
00159   public:
00160     void ADR_CALL ref() {
00161       ++m_ref_count;
00162     }
00163 
00164     void ADR_CALL unref() {
00165       if (--m_ref_count == 0) {
00166         delete this;
00167       }
00168     }
00169 
00170   private:
00171     int m_ref_count;
00172   };

00684   inline const char* GetVersion() {

00689   inline void SplitString(
00690     std::vector<std::string>& out,
00691     const char* in,
00692     char delim)
00693   {
00694     out.clear();
00695     while (*in) {
00696       const char* next = strchr(in, delim);
00697       if (next) {
00698         out.push_back(std::string(in, next));
00699       } else {
00700         out.push_back(in);
00701       }
00702 
00703       in = (next ? next + 1 : "");
00704     }
00705   }

00707 
00709   struct FileFormatDesc {
00711     std::string description;
00712 
00714     std::vector<std::string> extensions;
00715   };
00716 
00718   inline void GetSupportedFileFormats(std::vector<FileFormatDesc>& formats) {
00719     std::vector<std::string> descriptions;
00720     SplitString(descriptions, hidden::AdrGetSupportedFileFormats(), ';');
00721 
00722     formats.resize(descriptions.size());
00723     for (unsigned i = 0; i < descriptions.size(); ++i) {
00724       const char* d = descriptions[i].c_str();
00725       const char* colon = strchr(d, ':');
00726       formats[i].description.assign(d, colon);
00727 
00728       SplitString(formats[i].extensions, colon + 1, ',');
00729     }
00730   }
00731 
00732 
00734   struct AudioDeviceDesc {
00736     std::string name;
00737 
00738     // Textual description of device.
00739     std::string description;
00740   };
00741 
00743   inline void GetSupportedAudioDevices(std::vector<AudioDeviceDesc>& devices) {
00744     std::vector<std::string> descriptions;
00745     SplitString(descriptions, hidden::AdrGetSupportedAudioDevices(), ';');
00746 
00747     devices.resize(descriptions.size());
00748     for (unsigned i = 0; i < descriptions.size(); ++i) {
00749       std::vector<std::string> d;
00750       SplitString(d, descriptions[i].c_str(), ':');
00751       devices[i].name        = d[0];
00752       devices[i].description = d[1];
00753     }
00754   }
